titles.title: CCAMPIS Reauthorization Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide greater support to students with dependents, and for other purposes.
CCAMPIS Reauthorization Act
Child Care Access Means Parents in School Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Child Care Access Means Parents in School Reauthorization Act or the CCAMPIS Reauthorization Act
This bill amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise and permanently reauthorize the Child Care Access Means Parents in School grant program.
